articles.title: Takeaways from the Trump hush money trial: Ex-publisher details tabloid tactics - CNN
articles.description: Former American Media Inc. chairman David Pecker took jurors in Donald Trump’s hush money case inside how he paid for Karen McDougal’s story to keep her quiet about her alleged affair with Trump – and how his decision not to pay for Stormy Daniels’ story led …

articles.title: Anglo American’s Stumbles Have Made It Prey for BHP - Bloomberg
